origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BusinessAPI.find_case_studies', 'description': 'This function finds case studies of businesses based on the specified sector, performance, and number of cases.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of the economy to focus on, e.g., real_economy, tech.'}, {'name': 'performance', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The performance level of the businesses, e.g., outstanding, average.'}, {'name': 'number_of_cases', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of case studies to return.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'A list of case studies matching the specified criteria.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BusinessAPI.find_case_studies, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'real_economy', 'performance'是'outstanding', 'number_of_cases'是'3'.
